otherNames: Dui Wo Er Yan Wei Xian De Ta
He Who is Dangerous to Me
She Who Is Dangerous to Me
comments: Not Bad. One Time Watchable. Last Few Episodes Are Too Boring. Ending Was Too Simple. And There Are Too Many Kiss Scenes That I Found Annoying.
synopsis: My Lethal Man (Chinese Drama); 对我而言危险的他; A Dangerous Man;Dui Wo Er Yan Wei Xian De Ta;He Who is Dangerous to Me;Meu Homem Letal;She Who Is Dangerous (Source: MyDramaList)
